attributes.action: Add none of the above to ballot papers
attributes.background: I wish to have an option where voters can give a vote stating that they do not wish to vote for any candidate, this is an opportunity for the voting public to express their opinions without a spoiled ballot paper

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Require a “none of the above” option for all elections/referendums:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575629
